query:
SELECT l.id, l.nome, l.numeroLoja, 
       (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM analise_fichas_relatorios r WHERE r.lojaId = l.id) as relatorios_count
FROM users u
JOIN gestores g ON u.id = g.userId
JOIN gestor_lojas gl ON g.id = gl.gestorId
JOIN lojas l ON gl.lojaId = l.id
WHERE u.name LIKE '%Carlos Eduardo%'
ORDER BY l.nome;

JOIN gestor_lojas gl ON g.id = gl.gestorId
